channel.title: Maven on Zomzog's blog
channel.description: Recent content in Maven on Zomzog's blog
channel.copyright: All code and content for this blog is available as [open source on GitHub](https://github.com/zomzog/zomzog.fr).

item.title: OpenApi generator client auth token management
item.description:
Gitflow is a branching model for Git where the develop branch contains staging modification and master branch contains released commits.

In this article, I will present you how we simplified maven version management to avoid merge conflict and ease our release process.

item.title: Gitflow + Maven = JgitVer
item.description:
Gitflow is a branching model for Git where the develop branch contains staging modification and master branch contains released commits.

In this article, I will present you how we simplified maven version management to avoid merge conflict and ease our release process.
